description.value:
Average Height : 5'4" - 6'0"

Average Weight : 150 - 240

Ability scores : +2 Constitution, +2 Dexterity

Size : Medium

Speed : 6 squares.

Vision : Normal

Languages : Common, Primordial

Skill Bonuses : +2 Athletics.

 

BULLYWUG FEATURES

Rancid Air

(Poison) aura 2: Any enemy that spends a healing surge within the aura is weakened until the end of its next turn.

Swamp Walk

A creature that has swamp walk ignores difficult terrain that is mud or shallow water.

 

Bullywug Male Names : Brup, Lup, Mub, Yub

Bullywug Female Names : Duwup, Gibub, Gyup, Wubip

Published in Monster Manual 2, page(s) 220.
